attributes.action: Allow Donald Trump to U.K. for State Visit because he stands for Western Values
attributes.additional_details: Donald Trump's misdocumented remarks on misoginy and his better documented forthright views on the adverse effects of multiculturalism and excessive immigration from non civilised nations mean he should be given a knighthood and made honourable President of the Western World.
attributes.background: Donald Trump should not only be allowed to enter the UK in his capacity as the head of the US Goverment, he should be given an honorary Knighthood whilst at the Palace. Indeed if he does possess a U.K. Passport it should not be 'honorary'.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178844

We also can't accept petitions which are about honours or appointments. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
